languages.text: Пикт-хроника, запечатленная очами сервочерепов, заставила мое сердце трепетать. С ужасом наблюдал я за матросом, с виду совершенно здоровым, который пытался вырваться из оков операционного стола, когда группа деловитых врачей, возбужденно перешептываясь, обнажила сталь хирургических инструментов и с энтузиазмом принялась кроить его плоть.

traits.locale_text: Пикт-хроника, запечатленная очами сервочерепов, заставила мое сердце трепетать. С ужасом наблюдал я за матросом, с виду совершенно здоровым, который пытался вырваться из оков операционного стола, когда группа деловитых врачей, возбужденно перешептываясь, обнажила сталь хирургических инструментов и с энтузиазмом принялась кроить его плоть.

languages.text: The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.
languages.original_text: Пикт-хроника, запечатленная очами сервочерепов, заставила мое сердце трепетать. С ужасом наблюдал я за матросом, с виду совершенно здоровым, который пытался вырваться из оков операционного стола, когда группа деловитых врачей, возбужденно перешептываясь, обнажила сталь хирургических инструментов и с энтузиазмом принялась кроить его плоть.

In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

languages.text: La crónica de grabaimágenes de los servocráneos hizo que me diera un vuelco el corazón. Horrorizado, contemplé cómo un tripulante, que parecía encontrarse perfectamente sano, se debatía contra los grilletes que lo ataban a una mesa de operaciones y cómo un grupo de médicos susurraban emocionados, sacaban instrumental quirúrgico de acero y empezaban a hacer incisiones en su carne.
languages.original_text: The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

traits.locale_text: La crónica de grabaimágenes de los servocráneos hizo que me diera un vuelco el corazón. Horrorizado, contemplé cómo un tripulante, que parecía encontrarse perfectamente sano, se debatía contra los grilletes que lo ataban a una mesa de operaciones y cómo un grupo de médicos susurraban emocionados, sacaban instrumental quirúrgico de acero y empezaban a hacer incisiones en su carne.

languages.text: 伺服头骨记录下来的视讯资料让我心中一阵抽搐。我惊恐地看着某个看起来非常健康的船员正在拼命挣扎，想要挣脱把他钉在手术台上的镣铐，而一群船医兴奋地窃窃私语，之后掏出他们的钢质手术器械，急不可耐地切开了那个人的肉体。
languages.original_text: The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

traits.locale_text: 伺服头骨记录下来的视讯资料让我心中一阵抽搐。我惊恐地看着某个看起来非常健康的船员正在拼命挣扎，想要挣脱把他钉在手术台上的镣铐，而一群船医兴奋地窃窃私语，之后掏出他们的钢质手术器械，急不可耐地切开了那个人的肉体。

languages.text: サーヴォスカルの目で記録された映像年代記が私の心を震わせた。恐怖に怯えながら、健康に全く問題がなさそうなのに、手術台に固定されて抵抗するクルーの目線で私はその映像を見た。医師達の集団は興奮した様子でささやきながら、鉄の手術器具を取り出し、熱心に男の肉体を切り始めたのだ。
languages.original_text: The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

traits.locale_text: サーヴォスカルの目で記録された映像年代記が私の心を震わせた。恐怖に怯えながら、健康に全く問題がなさそうなのに、手術台に固定されて抵抗するクルーの目線で私はその映像を見た。医師達の集団は興奮した様子でささやきながら、鉄の手術器具を取り出し、熱心に男の肉体を切り始めたのだ。

languages.text: Die Bildchronik, die von den Augen der Servo-Skulls aufgenommen wurde, ließ mein Herz stottern. Entsetzt beobachtete ich, wie ein scheinbar völlig gesundes Besatzungsmitglied sich gegen die Fesseln wehrte, mit denen es an einen Operationstisch gefesselt war, und wie eine Gruppe von Ärzten, die aufgeregt miteinander flüsterten, ihre stählernen chirurgischen Instrumente zückten und eifrig begannen, in sein Fleisch zu schneiden.
languages.original_text: The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

languages.text: En voyant la pictochronique enregistrée par les yeux des servocrânes, mon cœur a défailli. J'ai vu avec effroi un membre d'équipage, pourtant en parfaite santé, se débattre sur une table d'opération tandis qu'un groupe de médecins, plongés dans leurs messes basses, entaillaient sa chair de leurs instruments chirurgicaux.
languages.original_text: The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

traits.locale_text: En voyant la pictochronique enregistrée par les yeux des servocrânes, mon cœur a défailli. J'ai vu avec effroi un membre d'équipage, pourtant en parfaite santé, se débattre sur une table d'opération tandis qu'un groupe de médecins, plongés dans leurs messes basses, entaillaient sa chair de leurs instruments chirurgicaux.

languages.text: Hizmeletlerin gözünden kaydedilen foto vakayiname, kalbimin teklemesine sebep oldu. Son derecede sağlıklı görünen bir tayfanın, onu ameliyat masasına sabitleyen zincirlerle mücadele edişini ve bir grup doktorun kendi arasında heyecanla fısıldaşmasını, metal cerrahi aletlerini çıkarıp hevesle tayfanın bedenini kesmeye başlamalarını dehşetle seyrettim.
languages.original_text: The pict chronicle recorded by the eyes of the servo-skulls made my heart stutter. In horror, I watched as a crewman, who seemed perfectly healthy, struggled against the shackles pinning him to an operating table, and a group of doctors, whispering excitedly among themselves, drew out their steel surgical instruments and eagerly began cutting into his flesh.

traits.locale_text: Hizmeletlerin gözünden kaydedilen foto kayıtları, kalbimin teklemesine sebep oluyor. Mükemmel derecede sağlıklı görünen bir tayfanın, onu ameliyat masasına sabitleyen zincirlerle mücadele ettiğini ve bir grup doktorun kendi arasında heyecanla fısıldaştığını, metal ameliyat malzemelerini çıkarıp hevesle tayfanın bedenini kesmeye başladıklarını dehşet içinde izliyorum.
